page.title: 12Brisley/Horningtoft Houses
page.content:
This area includes many properties which are over 100 years old.Many of them have been altered and joined together over the years.Some have been converted from barns and other farm buildings.There are also a number of houses and bungalows built in the last 20 years.
Most of the buildings are made of red brick, but occasionally flint has been used.A few walls are cement rendered. Roofs are normally pantiles, a few have slates.
Houses have mains water and electricity.Sewage disposal is by septic tank.
